com.korotkevich.provider.command.pagination

Class PaginationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.korotkevich.provider.command.pagination.PaginationManager

  • public class PaginationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class provides methods for pagination needs such as calculation of page number, direction(forward, backward) etc.
    Author:
    Korotkevich Kirill 2018-05-10
